profile:
***COVID-19 UPDATE: WHILE OUR FACILITY REMAINS CLOSED TO THE PUBLIC, WE ARE CURRENTLY CONDUCTING A LIMITED NUMBER OF FREE IN-HOME ESTIMATES (BY APPOINTMENT ONLY) APPLYING ESTABLISHED PHYSICAL DISTANCING & SAFETY MEASURES.***      

TMC Restoration is a family owned and operated business providing quality furniture and antique repair and restoration services from our original location since 1989. Our president, Bill McBride has been deeply involved in the local furniture restoration industry since the early 1970s and is intimately acquainted with the home furnishing needs of consumers throughout the greater Toronto area and southern Ontario. Despite the expansion of our range of services, our location and our workforce – every valued team member at TMC Restoration appreciates the importance of extending personalized customer care.

At TMC Restoration we pride ourselves on the quality of both our restoration service and the level of customer care we provide. The consumer feedback we receive consistently confirms our dedication to customer satisfaction and accommodation.

We extend our complete range of services to both residential and corporate clientele, and our work adorns thousands of additional local private residences and commercial spaces every year. Our work is fully guaranteed and our complimentary, on-site free estimation service means you never have to leave your dwelling or office to receive a free, detailed estimate.

TMC Restoration is the largest furniture and antique restoration company in Ontario. Decades of experience have informed our approach to everything we do and our longevity and ongoing commitment to service excellence has produced substantial repeat and referral business. Our reputation is built on the promise of complete customer satisfaction. From the initial estimate to the final delivery of your restored furniture – we are confident you will be impressed and refreshed by your experience with TMC Restoration.

TMC Restoration is the right choice!

profile:
Fibrenew Markham specializes in the repair, restoration and renewal of leather, plastics, vinyl, fabric and upholstery servicing six major markets: automotive, aviation, commercial, medical, marine and residential. Utilizing our services to repair damaged materials in your vehicle, boat, airplane, home or office offers an environmentally-friendly and cost-effective alternative to replacement.

Leather Repair, Vinyl Restoration and Plastic Renewal Services in: Markham, ON; Unionville, ON; Newtonbrook, ON; Hillcrest Village, ON; Bayview Woods - Steeles, ON
